item.title: KIWI
item.description: More info about the kiwi coming soon.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This section is being worked on.

item.title: Avatar
item.description: Avatar puts you back in control of your online identity! You should be able to access the internet freely without having to give up your personal information.

item.title: Bounty
item.description: Bounty is a better crowd funding platform that lets you influence what should be developed next. Developing products based on demand.

item.title: Mentor
item.description: No more managers. Work together and profit together. Mentor is the fairer way of working. No more ‘Bosses’ telling you what to do.

item.title: Verified
item.description: Verified protects your assets at all times. Asset ownership and protection easily managed and secured on the blockchain.
